## Pfs files

* Text files with a simple nested structure.
* Used to store settings for MIKE by DHI software.



## Pfs file structure

```
[TARGET1]
   keywordA = parameterA
   [SECTION1]
      keywordB = parameterB
      keywordC = parameterC
      [SECTION2]
         keywordD = parameterD         
      EndSect  // SECTION2 
   EndSect  // SECTION1 
EndSect  // TARGET1

[TARGET2]
   keywordE = parameterE 
   [SECTION3]
      keywordF = parameterF
   EndSect  // SECTION3 
EndSect  // TARGET2
```
